name: Voltage Tester
description: used to make cold weld joints between wires and a connector by deforming one or both of then to hold the other

name: Line taster
description: Used to test the presence of current and to identity phase/live wire in electrical installations.

name: Conduit Bender
description: used to bend electrical pipes for installation. Used to test the presence of current and to identity phase.

name: Rescue Hook/Rod
description: Used to remove persons incapacitated by electrical shock from the danger area.

name: Crimpers
description: Used to make cold weld joints between wires and a connector by deforming one or both of them to hold the other.

name: Terminal Block
description: Used to secure and/or terminate wires. At first  we selected 3 times , then final selection are collected for our tool-zone
